 -     The factors in addition to the date and period of time used to determine the inclusion and exclusion of items in the data elements and population
(3)    The definition is complete and accurate.
(4)    The description of the data identifies any information that is necessary to understand each data element and the population in a manner consistent with its definition and intended purpose (meta-data) that has not been included within the data.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, create clear documentation for all provided data.  Include definitions accessible to users that cover the data's purpose, how it's sourced, and the measurements used. Specify the data's accuracy, confidence intervals, relevant timeframes, and inclusion/exclusion criteria. Finally, ensure the metadata is complete, accurate, and describes any critical context not directly present in the data itself.

name: The entity implements policies and procedures over system inputs, including controls over completeness and accuracy, to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity's objectives.
description: The entity implements policies and procedures over system inputs, including controls over completeness and accuracy, to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity's objectives.

subcontrols.name: Defines Characteristics of Processing Inputs - The characteristics of processing inputs that are necessary to meet requirements are defined.
subcontrols.description: Defines Characteristics of Processing Inputs - The characteristics of processing inputs that are necessary to meet requirements are defined.
subcontrols.guidance: This SOC2 control focuses on specifying your data requirements. Clearly document the necessary format, content, and quality of data needed to process information correctly. Consider data types, accepted ranges, and validation rules to ensure input consistency. This helps prevent errors and ensures reliable system output.

subcontrols.name: Evaluates Processing Inputs - Processing inputs are evaluated for compliance with defined input requirements.
subcontrols.description: Evaluates Processing Inputs - Processing inputs are evaluated for compliance with defined input requirements.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, establish clear, documented requirements for all data inputs. Implement validation checks to ensure incoming data adheres to these specifications. Regularly monitor input data for errors or anomalies, and have procedures to address any discrepancies. Document all evaluation processes and results for auditability.

subcontrols.name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Inputs - Records of system input activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.description: Creates and Maintains Records of System Inputs - Records of system input activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.guidance: To satisfy the SOC2 control for system inputs, meticulously log all data entering your systems. Ensure these records are complete, accurate, and reflect the exact timing of each input. Regularly review these logs for data integrity and any anomalies. Properly retain these records for the required audit period.

name: The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity's objectives.
description: The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity's objectives.

subcontrols.name: Defines Processing Specifications - The processing specifications that are necessary to meet product or service requirements are defined.
subcontrols.description: Defines Processing Specifications - The processing specifications that are necessary to meet product or service requirements are defined.
subcontrols.guidance: To satisfy this SOC2 control, clearly document all technical details outlining how your product or service functions. This includes specifications for data handling, algorithms, security protocols, and any other internal processes impacting performance and security. Ensure these specifications are readily accessible and reviewed regularly. This allows for consistent execution, adherence to requirements, and facilitates troubleshooting. By doing so, you demonstrate transparency and control.

subcontrols.name: Defines Processing Activities - Processing activities are defined to result in products or services that meet specifications.
subcontrols.description: Defines Processing Activities - Processing activities are defined to result in products or services that meet specifications.
subcontrols.guidance: This SOC2 control requires you to clearly outline how you create your products/services.  Document each step, from start to finish, detailing what happens at each stage.  Ensure this documentation specifies how each step contributes to delivering the final product that aligns with pre-defined specifications.  This helps guarantee consistency and quality in your offerings. This also serves as a vital reference point for any troubleshooting.

subcontrols.name: Detects and Corrects Production Errors - Errors in the production process are detected and corrected in a timely manner.
subcontrols.description: Detects and Corrects Production Errors - Errors in the production process are detected and corrected in a timely manner.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement robust monitoring systems and logging to identify production errors swiftly. Establish clear procedures for error escalation and remediation. Ensure timely investigation and resolution of reported issues. Regularly analyze error trends to identify and address root causes, preventing recurrence. Document all error detection, correction, and prevention activities.

subcontrols.name: Records System Processing Activities - System processing activities are recorded completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.description: Records System Processing Activities - System processing activities are recorded completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure all system activities are logged, capturing relevant details. These logs must be complete, accurate, and promptly recorded. Regularly review and analyze the logs for anomalies and potential issues. Implement proper access controls to protect the logs from unauthorized modification. This helps maintain data integrity and provides an audit trail.

subcontrols.name: Processes Inputs - Inputs are processed completely, accurately, and timely as authorized in accordance with defined processing activities.
subcontrols.description: Processes Inputs - Inputs are processed completely, accurately, and timely as authorized in accordance with defined processing activities.
subcontrols.guidance: To ensure complete and accurate processing, verify inputs match authorized formats and data fields. Implement validation checks at data entry and during processing to catch errors early.  Monitor input processing for timeliness, comparing actual completion times against established benchmarks.  Establish clear escalation procedures for any processing delays or input discrepancies. Document all input handling, processing, and error resolution.

name: The entity implements policies and procedures to make available or deliver output completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with specifications to meet the entity's objectives.
description: The entity implements policies and procedures to make available or deliver output completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with specifications to meet the entity's objectives.

subcontrols.name: Protects Output - Output is protected when stored or delivered, or both, to prevent theft, destruction, corruption, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.
subcontrols.description: Protects Output - Output is protected when stored or delivered, or both, to prevent theft, destruction, corruption, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure data outputs are secured during storage and transmission. Implement encryption, access controls, and integrity checks to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. Verify outputs meet specified quality standards. Regularly audit and monitor output protection measures.

subcontrols.name: Distributes Output Only to Intended Parties - Output is distributed or made available only to intended parties.
subcontrols.description: Distributes Output Only to Intended Parties - Output is distributed or made available only to intended parties.
subcontrols.guidance: Verify that access controls restrict output distribution to authorized recipients. Implement secure transmission methods like encryption and authentication.  Log and monitor output distribution to detect unauthorized access. Regularly review recipient lists and permissions. Ensure output is not readily accessible to unintended users.

subcontrols.name: Distributes Output Completely and Accurately - Procedures are in place to provide for the completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of distributed output.
subcontrols.description: Distributes Output Completely and Accurately - Procedures are in place to provide for the completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of distributed output.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure all generated reports and data transmissions are thoroughly validated for completeness and accuracy. Implement automated checks and manual reviews to verify output integrity. Establish timely delivery mechanisms and monitoring to meet distribution schedules. Document procedures for output generation, distribution, and error handling. Regularly audit these processes to maintain control effectiveness.

subcontrols.name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Output Activities - Records of system output activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.description: Creates and Maintains Records of System Output Activities - Records of system output activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, meticulously track all system outputs. Ensure these records are comprehensive, accurate, and generated promptly. Maintain output logs securely for the required retention period. Regularly review these logs to confirm data integrity and compliance. Finally, have a documented process for handling and archiving output data.

name: The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with system specifications to meet the entity's objectives.
description: The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with system specifications to meet the entity's objectives.

subcontrols.name: Protects Stored Items - Stored items are protected to prevent theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.
subcontrols.description: Protects Stored Items - Stored items are protected to prevent theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.
subcontrols.guidance: Secure stored data with strong access controls, encryption, and physical security measures. Implement regular backups and data integrity checks to prevent corruption. Protect against environmental hazards like fire and floods.  Regularly review storage security and implement updates to maintain data integrity. This ensures data availability and prevents loss or damage.

subcontrols.name: Archives and Protects System Records - System records are archived, and archives are protected against theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent them from being used.
subcontrols.description: Archives and Protects System Records - System records are archived, and archives are protected against theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent them from being used.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, establish a secure archival process. Regularly back up system records to a protected location, using encryption and access controls. Implement procedures for verifying archive integrity and testing restoration capabilities. Securely store archives, protecting them from physical and logical threats. Document all archiving and protection measures.

subcontrols.name: Stores Data Completely and Accurately - Procedures are in place to provide for the complete, accurate, and timely storage of data.
subcontrols.description: Stores Data Completely and Accurately - Procedures are in place to provide for the complete, accurate, and timely storage of data.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement robust data validation routines and error handling across all systems. Regularly audit data storage processes for completeness and accuracy. Utilize automated backups and disaster recovery plans to ensure data preservation. Establish access controls to prevent unauthorized modification or deletion.  Document all procedures for data storage and retrieval.

subcontrols.name: Creates and Maintains Records of System Storage Activities - Records of system storage activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.description: Creates and Maintains Records of System Storage Activities - Records of system storage activities are created and maintained completely and accurately in a timely manner.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply with this SOC2 control, meticulously log all system storage activities. Ensure these records are complete, accurate, and created promptly.  Store these logs securely and retain them for a defined period. Regularly review the logs to identify and address any anomalies.

name: The entity provides notice to data subjects about its privacy practices to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The notice is updated and communicated to data subjects in a timely manner for changes to the entity's privacy practices, including changes in the use of personal information, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity provides notice to data subjects about its privacy practices to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The notice is updated and communicated to data subjects in a timely manner for changes to the entity's privacy practices, including changes in the use of personal information, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name:
Communicates to Data Subjects - Notice is provided to data subjects regarding the following:
 -     Purpose for collecting personal information
 -     Choice and consent
 -     Types of personal information collected
 -     Methods of collection (for example, use of cookies or other tracking techniques)
 -     Use, retention, and disposal
 -     Access
 -     Disclosure to third parties
 -     Security for privacy
 -     Quality, including data subjects' responsibilities for quality
 -     Monitoring and enforcement
If personal information is collected from sources other than the individual, such sources are described in the privacy notice.
subcontrols.description:
Communicates to Data Subjects - Notice is provided to data subjects regarding the following:
 -     Purpose for collecting personal information
 -     Choice and consent
 -     Types of personal information collected
 -     Methods of collection (for example, use of cookies or other tracking techniques)
 -     Use, retention, and disposal
 -     Access
 -     Disclosure to third parties
 -     Security for privacy
 -     Quality, including data subjects' responsibilities for quality
 -     Monitoring and enforcement
If personal information is collected from sources other than the individual, such sources are described in the privacy notice.
subcontrols.guidance: This SOC2 control requires a clear and comprehensive privacy notice. Your notice must inform data subjects about all aspects of their personal information: what's collected, why, how, and with whom it's shared. It also includes how to access, control, and protect their data. Ensure you detail how you handle data obtained from third-party sources. Your privacy notice is crucial for transparency and compliance.

subcontrols.name: Provides Notice to Data Subjects - Notice is provided to data subjects (1) at or before the time personal information is collected or as soon as practical thereafter, (2) at or before the entity changes its privacy notice or as soon as practical thereafter, or (3) before personal information is used for new purposes not previously identified.
subcontrols.description: Provides Notice to Data Subjects - Notice is provided to data subjects (1) at or before the time personal information is collected or as soon as practical thereafter, (2) at or before the entity changes its privacy notice or as soon as practical thereafter, or (3) before personal information is used for new purposes not previously identified.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet the SOC2 control, clearly inform users about your data collection practices upfront. This includes detailing what data is collected and how it's used. Update the privacy notice promptly when changes occur or when data is used for new purposes. Ensure users are aware of any modifications to your data handling processes.

subcontrols.name: Covers Entities and Activities in Notice  - An objective description of the entities and activities covered is included in the entity's privacy notice.
subcontrols.description: Covers Entities and Activities in Notice  - An objective description of the entities and activities covered is included in the entity's privacy notice.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure your privacy notice clearly outlines the specific entities (e.g., company, subsidiaries) and activities (e.g., data collection, processing, sharing) it applies to. This means naming the responsible parties and detailing what user data is used for. The notice should be easy to find and understand for users. If changes are made to entities or activities, update the notice promptly.

subcontrols.name: Uses Clear and Conspicuous Language - The entity's privacy notice is conspicuous and uses clear language.
subcontrols.description: Uses Clear and Conspicuous Language - The entity's privacy notice is conspicuous and uses clear language.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure your privacy notice is easily noticeable and accessible. Avoid jargon and use plain language understandable by your target audience. Make sure key details like data collection practices and user rights are highlighted. Regularly review and update the notice to maintain clarity. Aim for transparency to build user trust and meet SOC2 requirements.

name: The entity communicates choices available regarding the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information to the data subjects and the consequences, if any, of each choice. Explicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is obtained from data subjects or other authorized persons, if required. Such consent is obtained only for the intended purpose of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity's basis for determining implicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is documented.
description: The entity communicates choices available regarding the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information to the data subjects and the consequences, if any, of each choice. Explicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is obtained from data subjects or other authorized persons, if required. Such consent is obtained only for the intended purpose of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity's basis for determining implicit consent for the collection, use, retention, disclosure, and disposal of personal information is documented.

subcontrols.name: Communicates to Data Subjects - Data subjects are informed (a) about the choices available to them with respect to the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information and (b) that implicit or explicit consent is required to collect, use, and disclose personal information, unless a law or regulation specifically requires or allows otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Communicates to Data Subjects - Data subjects are informed (a) about the choices available to them with respect to the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information and (b) that implicit or explicit consent is required to collect, use, and disclose personal information, unless a law or regulation specifically requires or allows otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: Clearly and concisely inform data subjects about their privacy choices. Explain how their personal information is collected, used, and shared. Obtain either explicit or implicit consent for data processing, except where legal exemptions exist. Provide readily accessible information, perhaps through a privacy policy. Transparency builds trust and fulfills this SOC2 requirement.

subcontrols.name: Communicates Consequences of Denying or Withdrawing Consent - When personal information is collected, data subjects are informed of the consequences of refusing to provide personal information or denying or withdrawing consent to use personal information for purposes identified in the notice.
subcontrols.description: Communicates Consequences of Denying or Withdrawing Consent - When personal information is collected, data subjects are informed of the consequences of refusing to provide personal information or denying or withdrawing consent to use personal information for purposes identified in the notice.
subcontrols.guidance: Clearly state the repercussions of refusing consent during initial data collection. Also, inform users about the effects of withdrawing consent later. This includes describing how denial or withdrawal might limit service access or functionality. Update this information as needed, communicating changes proactively. Ensure transparency regarding the impact of consent decisions.

subcontrols.name: Obtains Implicit or Explicit Consent - Implicit or explicit consent is obtained from data subjects at or before the time personal information is collected or soon thereafter. The individual's preferences expressed in his or her consent are confirmed and implemented.
subcontrols.description: Obtains Implicit or Explicit Consent - Implicit or explicit consent is obtained from data subjects at or before the time personal information is collected or soon thereafter. The individual's preferences expressed in his or her consent are confirmed and implemented.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure you clearly communicate data usage to users before or during data collection.  Provide options for explicit consent, like checkboxes. Respect and record user preferences. Regularly review consent practices and ensure compliance with stated choices.  Document everything!

subcontrols.name: Documents and Obtains Consent for New Purposes and Uses - If information that was previously collected is to be used for purposes not previously identified in the privacy notice, the new purpose is documented, the data subject is notified, and implicit or explicit consent is obtained prior to such new use or purpose.
subcontrols.description: Documents and Obtains Consent for New Purposes and Uses - If information that was previously collected is to be used for purposes not previously identified in the privacy notice, the new purpose is documented, the data subject is notified, and implicit or explicit consent is obtained prior to such new use or purpose.
subcontrols.guidance: Maintain a current privacy notice clearly outlining data uses.  Document any new intended uses for collected information.  Notify data subjects of these new purposes.  Obtain explicit or implicit consent before employing the data in these new ways.  Ensure documented consent and updates to the privacy notice.

subcontrols.name: Obtains Explicit Consent for Sensitive Information - Explicit consent is obtained directly from the data subject when sensitive personal information is collected, used, or disclosed, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Obtains Explicit Consent for Sensitive Information - Explicit consent is obtained directly from the data subject when sensitive personal information is collected, used, or disclosed, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: For SOC2 compliance, always get explicit consent before handling sensitive personal information. This means a clear, affirmative action (like checking a box) from the user.  Document how consent was obtained, including the date and content provided.  Ensure your consent process aligns with applicable laws and regulations.  Regularly review and update your consent practices.

subcontrols.name: Obtains Consent for Data Transfers - Consent is obtained before personal information is transferred to or from an individual's computer or other similar device.
subcontrols.description: Obtains Consent for Data Transfers - Consent is obtained before personal information is transferred to or from an individual's computer or other similar device.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply, always get explicit consent before moving personal data to or from a user's device. Clearly explain what data is being transferred, the purpose, and who will have access.  Document the consent process, including how it was obtained and the user's agreement.  Ensure users can easily withdraw their consent at any time. Regularly review and update your consent practices.

name: Personal information is collected consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: Personal information is collected consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Limits the Collection of Personal Information - The collection of personal information is limited to that necessary to meet the entity's objectives.
subcontrols.description: Limits the Collection of Personal Information - The collection of personal information is limited to that necessary to meet the entity's objectives.
subcontrols.guidance: Only gather personal data vital for your business goals. Minimize the amount of information you collect. Justify every piece of personal data you obtain. Regularly review collected data to ensure its ongoing necessity. Dispose of unnecessary data securely.

subcontrols.name: Collects Information by Fair and Lawful Means - Methods of collecting personal information are reviewed by management before they are implemented to confirm that personal information is obtained (a) fairly, without intimidation or deception, and (b) lawfully, adhering to all relevant rules of law, whether derived from statute or common law, relating to the collection of personal information.
subcontrols.description: Collects Information by Fair and Lawful Means - Methods of collecting personal information are reviewed by management before they are implemented to confirm that personal information is obtained (a) fairly, without intimidation or deception, and (b) lawfully, adhering to all relevant rules of law, whether derived from statute or common law, relating to the collection of personal information.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure all data collection methods are transparent and ethical, avoiding deception or coercion. Management must review and approve new collection practices before implementation. Verify that all collection complies with applicable privacy laws and regulations. Document the approval process and maintain records of the review. Regularly audit collection practices to ensure ongoing adherence.

subcontrols.name: Collects Information From Reliable Sources - Management confirms that third parties from whom personal information is collected (that is, sources other than the individual) are reliable sources that collect information fairly and lawfully.
subcontrols.description: Collects Information From Reliable Sources - Management confirms that third parties from whom personal information is collected (that is, sources other than the individual) are reliable sources that collect information fairly and lawfully.
subcontrols.guidance: Verify the reliability of external data sources.  Confirm they gather personal information ethically and legally.  Review their data collection practices and policies.  Document your due diligence and findings. Ensure ongoing monitoring of these sources.

subcontrols.name: Informs Data Subjects When Additional Information Is Acquired - Data subjects are informed if the entity develops or acquires additional information about them for its use.
subcontrols.description: Informs Data Subjects When Additional Information Is Acquired - Data subjects are informed if the entity develops or acquires additional information about them for its use.
subcontrols.guidance: This SOC2 control requires transparency. Notify data subjects if you collect new information about them. Clearly communicate the type of data acquired and its purpose. Provide a method for data subjects to access, correct, or delete this new information. This maintains trust and ensures compliance.

name: For information requiring explicit consent, the entity communicates the need for such consent, as well as the consequences of a failure to provide consent for the request for personal information, and obtains the consent prior to the collection of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: For information requiring explicit consent, the entity communicates the need for such consent, as well as the consequences of a failure to provide consent for the request for personal information, and obtains the consent prior to the collection of the information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Obtains Explicit Consent for Sensitive Information - Explicit consent is obtained directly from the data subject when sensitive personal information is collected, used, or disclosed, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Obtains Explicit Consent for Sensitive Information - Explicit consent is obtained directly from the data subject when sensitive personal information is collected, used, or disclosed, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply with this SOC2 control, always get direct, clear consent from individuals before collecting, using, or sharing their sensitive personal data.  This consent must be specific to the intended use and include a clear explanation of what will happen with their information.  Avoid implied consent; actively request it, such as through a checkbox or "I agree" button.  Document the date, time, and method of consent obtained. Ensure you review and update consents regularly.

subcontrols.name: Documents Explicit Consent to Retain Information–Documentation of explicit consent for the collection, use, or disclosure of sensitive personal information is retained in accordance with objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.description: Documents Explicit Consent to Retain Information–Documentation of explicit consent for the collection, use, or disclosure of sensitive personal information is retained in accordance with objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure you obtain clear, documented consent from individuals before collecting, using, or sharing their sensitive personal data. This consent must explicitly state the purpose and scope of data handling. Maintain records of this consent, including the date and method obtained.  These records should be stored securely and retained in line with your privacy policy.

name: The entity limits the use of personal information to the purposes identified in the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity limits the use of personal information to the purposes identified in the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Uses Personal Information for Intended Purposes - Personal information is used only for the intended purposes for which it was collected and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Uses Personal Information for Intended Purposes - Personal information is used only for the intended purposes for which it was collected and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure personal data is used strictly for the purpose you clearly stated during collection. Always get consent (explicit or implicit) before using personal information, unless legally mandated otherwise. Document how you obtain and manage this consent. Regularly review data usage to confirm alignment with original intentions and consent. This safeguards user privacy and maintains trust.

name: The entity retains personal information consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity retains personal information consistent with the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Retains Personal Information - Personal information is retained for no longer than necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Retains Personal Information - Personal information is retained for no longer than necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: Define data retention policies based on data purpose and legal requirements. Implement automated processes or manual reviews to ensure timely data deletion.  Document the retention period for each data type, including justification. Regularly audit your practices to confirm compliance and update policies as needed. When deleting, be sure to securely remove data from all storage locations.

subcontrols.name: Protects Personal Information - Policies and procedures have been implemented to protect personal information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.
subcontrols.description: Protects Personal Information - Policies and procedures have been implemented to protect personal information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure data retention policies are clearly defined and followed. Implement procedures to prevent accidental deletion or destruction of personal data during its retention period. Regularly audit systems to verify data integrity and adherence to retention schedules. Utilize backup and recovery mechanisms to safeguard data against loss. Train employees on proper data handling practices.

name: The entity securely disposes of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity securely disposes of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Captures, Identifies, and Flags Requests for Deletion - Requests for deletion of personal information are captured, and information related to the requests is identified and flagged for destruction to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.description: Captures, Identifies, and Flags Requests for Deletion - Requests for deletion of personal information are captured, and information related to the requests is identified and flagged for destruction to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet SOC2, track all personal data deletion requests. Identify the specific data involved in each request. Flag this data for secure and timely destruction. This ensures compliance with privacy regulations and protects sensitive information. Document the entire process.

subcontrols.name: Disposes of, Destroys, and Redacts Personal Information - Personal information no longer retained is anonymized, disposed of, or destroyed in a manner that prevents loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access.
subcontrols.description: Disposes of, Destroys, and Redacts Personal Information - Personal information no longer retained is anonymized, disposed of, or destroyed in a manner that prevents loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet the SOC2 control, securely eliminate old personal data.  Anonymize or destroy data you no longer need to avoid breaches.  Document your disposal methods to show compliance.  Ensure physical and digital destruction follows approved procedures. Properly redact sensitive data before disposal to prevent reconstruction.

subcontrols.name: Destroys Personal Information - Policies and procedures are implemented to erase or otherwise destroy personal information that has been identified for destruction.
subcontrols.description: Destroys Personal Information - Policies and procedures are implemented to erase or otherwise destroy personal information that has been identified for destruction.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement a clear policy outlining how and when to destroy personal information. Establish secure deletion methods, like data overwriting or physical shredding. Document all destruction activities, including dates and methods used. Regularly review and update the policy and procedures. Ensure compliance with all relevant data privacy regulations.

name: The entity grants identified and authenticated data subjects the ability to access their stored personal information for review and, upon request, provides physical or electronic copies of that information to data subjects to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If access is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial, as required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity grants identified and authenticated data subjects the ability to access their stored personal information for review and, upon request, provides physical or electronic copies of that information to data subjects to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If access is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial, as required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: ·       Authenticates Data Subjects' Identity - The identity of data subjects who request access to their personal information is authenticated before they are given access to that information.
subcontrols.description: ·       Authenticates Data Subjects' Identity - The identity of data subjects who request access to their personal information is authenticated before they are given access to that information.
subcontrols.guidance: To ensure data subject identity, implement a secure authentication method. This could involve verifying credentials like usernames and passwords, or utilizing multi-factor authentication. Validate the identity matches the request before granting access to personal data. This control prevents unauthorized access to sensitive information. Document and review the authentication process regularly.

subcontrols.name: Permits Data Subjects Access to Their Personal Information - Data subjects are able to determine whether the entity maintains personal information about them and, upon request, may obtain access to their personal information.
subcontrols.description: Permits Data Subjects Access to Their Personal Information - Data subjects are able to determine whether the entity maintains personal information about them and, upon request, may obtain access to their personal information.
subcontrols.guidance: Provide a clear and accessible process for individuals to request and receive their personal information. This includes outlining how to submit requests and the expected timeframe for response. Ensure data subjects can verify the accuracy of their information and correct any inaccuracies. Regularly review and update the process to meet evolving privacy regulations. Maintain comprehensive records of all data subject access requests.

subcontrols.name: Provides Understandable Personal Information Within Reasonable Time - Personal information is provided to data subjects in an understandable form, in a reasonable time frame, and at a reasonable cost, if any.
subcontrols.description: Provides Understandable Personal Information Within Reasonable Time - Personal information is provided to data subjects in an understandable form, in a reasonable time frame, and at a reasonable cost, if any.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply, you must ensure individuals can easily understand their personal data.  Provide this information promptly, within a reasonable timeframe, and at no or minimal cost.  Clearly explain data processing practices.  Document your processes for handling subject access requests.  Finally, regularly review and update these procedures.

subcontrols.name: ·       Informs Data Subjects If Access Is Denied - When data subjects are denied access to their personal information, the entity informs them of the denial and the reason for the denial in a timely manner, unless prohibited by law or regulation.
subcontrols.description: ·       Informs Data Subjects If Access Is Denied - When data subjects are denied access to their personal information, the entity informs them of the denial and the reason for the denial in a timely manner, unless prohibited by law or regulation.
subcontrols.guidance: If access to personal information is denied, promptly inform the data subject. Explain the reason for denial clearly, unless legally restricted. Maintain documentation of both the denial and the justification. This protects data subject rights and ensures transparency.

name: The entity corrects, amends, or appends personal information based on information provided by data subjects and communicates such information to third parties, as committed or required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If a request for correction is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity corrects, amends, or appends personal information based on information provided by data subjects and communicates such information to third parties, as committed or required, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. If a request for correction is denied, data subjects are informed of the denial and reason for such denial to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Communicates Denial of Access Requests - Data subjects are informed, in writing, of the reason a request for access to their personal information was denied, the source of the entity's legal right to deny such access, if applicable, and the individual's right, if any, to challenge such denial, as specifically permitted or required by law or regulation.
subcontrols.description: Communicates Denial of Access Requests - Data subjects are informed, in writing, of the reason a request for access to their personal information was denied, the source of the entity's legal right to deny such access, if applicable, and the individual's right, if any, to challenge such denial, as specifically permitted or required by law or regulation.
subcontrols.guidance: When denying a data access request, send a written explanation to the data subject. This explanation must include the reason for denial, the legal basis for denial (if applicable), and their rights to challenge the decision. Ensure your communication complies with all relevant laws and regulations. Document all denied requests and the reasons for denial for audit purposes.

subcontrols.name: Permits Data Subjects to Update or Correct Personal Information - Data subjects are able to update or correct personal information held by the entity. The entity provides such updated or corrected information to third parties that were previously provided with the data subject's personal information consistent with the entity's objective related to privacy.
subcontrols.description: Permits Data Subjects to Update or Correct Personal Information - Data subjects are able to update or correct personal information held by the entity. The entity provides such updated or corrected information to third parties that were previously provided with the data subject's personal information consistent with the entity's objective related to privacy.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement a clear process for data subjects to update/correct their personal information.  Ensure data subjects can easily access this process. Systematically update all relevant systems and records with corrected information.  Inform any third parties who received the outdated data of the changes, in accordance with privacy objectives.  Document the entire process for audit purposes.

subcontrols.name: Communicates Denial of Correction Requests - Data subjects are informed, in writing, about the reason a request for correction of personal information was denied and how they may appeal.
subcontrols.description: Communicates Denial of Correction Requests - Data subjects are informed, in writing, about the reason a request for correction of personal information was denied and how they may appeal.
subcontrols.guidance: When a data subject's request to correct personal information is denied, clearly document the rationale for the denial in writing. This communication must also detail the appeal process available to the data subject. Ensure this process adheres to relevant privacy regulations. Maintain records of all denial communications and appeals.

name: The entity discloses personal information to third parties with the explicit consent of data subjects, and such consent is obtained prior to disclosure to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity discloses personal information to third parties with the explicit consent of data subjects, and such consent is obtained prior to disclosure to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Communicates Privacy Policies to Third Parties - Privacy policies or other specific instructions or requirements for handling personal information are communicated to third parties to whom personal information is disclosed.
subcontrols.description: Communicates Privacy Policies to Third Parties - Privacy policies or other specific instructions or requirements for handling personal information are communicated to third parties to whom personal information is disclosed.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, ensure all third parties receiving your customer's personal information are provided with your privacy policies and data handling requirements. This communication must clearly outline their responsibilities regarding data protection. Keep records of these communications, such as signed agreements or confirmation emails.  Regularly review and update these agreements as your privacy policies evolve. Finally, monitor third-party compliance with your policies.

subcontrols.name: Discloses Personal Information Only When Appropriate - Personal information is disclosed to third parties only for the purposes for which it was collected or created and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained from the data subject, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.description: Discloses Personal Information Only When Appropriate - Personal information is disclosed to third parties only for the purposes for which it was collected or created and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained from the data subject, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure you only share personal information with third parties for the reasons it was collected or created.  Always get explicit or implied consent from the individual before disclosing their data.  Document this consent.  Make exceptions only when required by law.  Maintain robust policies and procedures to support these actions.

subcontrols.name: Discloses Personal Information Only to Appropriate Third Parties - Personal information is disclosed only to third parties who have agreements with the entity to protect personal information in a manner consistent with the relevant aspects of the entity's privacy notice or other specific instructions or requirements. The entity has procedures in place to evaluate that the third parties have effective controls to meet the terms of the agreement, instructions, or requirements.
subcontrols.description: Discloses Personal Information Only to Appropriate Third Parties - Personal information is disclosed only to third parties who have agreements with the entity to protect personal information in a manner consistent with the relevant aspects of the entity's privacy notice or other specific instructions or requirements. The entity has procedures in place to evaluate that the third parties have effective controls to meet the terms of the agreement, instructions, or requirements.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure all third-party data sharing agreements explicitly require privacy protection consistent with your privacy notice.  Regularly assess third parties' security controls to verify they uphold these agreements. Document these assessments and any remediation efforts.  Only share personal information with compliant third parties.  This safeguards your customer data and aligns with SOC2 requirements.

subcontrols.name: Discloses Information to Third Parties for New Purposes and Uses - Personal information is disclosed to third parties for new purposes or uses only with the prior implicit or explicit consent of data subjects.
subcontrols.description: Discloses Information to Third Parties for New Purposes and Uses - Personal information is disclosed to third parties for new purposes or uses only with the prior implicit or explicit consent of data subjects.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure you obtain consent before sharing personal information with third parties for any new purposes beyond the original agreement. Consent can be explicit (written) or implicit (based on reasonable expectations). Clearly communicate the new purpose and third-party identity to data subjects. Document all consent obtained, including the method and date. Review and update your policies regularly to reflect current data privacy regulations.

name: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of authorized disclosures of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of authorized disclosures of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Creates and Retains Record of Authorized Disclosures - The entity creates and maintains a record of authorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
subcontrols.description: Creates and Retains Record of Authorized Disclosures - The entity creates and maintains a record of authorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
subcontrols.guidance: Maintain a detailed log of all personal information disclosures. This log must include the date, purpose, recipient, and specific data shared. Ensure the record is accurate and complete, reflecting all authorized disclosures. Regularly review and update the log. This log is crucial for demonstrating compliance and traceability.

name: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures (including breaches) of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures (including breaches) of personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures - The entity creates and maintains a record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
subcontrols.description: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures - The entity creates and maintains a record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement a system to log all detected or reported unauthorized personal information disclosures. This log should include details like the date, nature of the disclosure, affected data, and actions taken. Ensure the log is complete, accurate, and updated promptly. Regularly review the log to identify trends and improve security. This record is crucial for incident response, remediation, and compliance reporting.

name: The entity obtains privacy commitments from vendors and other third parties who have access to personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity assesses those parties' compliance on a periodic and as-needed basis and takes corrective action, if necessary.
description: The entity obtains privacy commitments from vendors and other third parties who have access to personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. The entity assesses those parties' compliance on a periodic and as-needed basis and takes corrective action, if necessary.

subcontrols.name: Discloses Personal Information Only to Appropriate Third Parties - Personal information is disclosed only to third parties who have agreements with the entity to protect personal information in a manner consistent with the relevant aspects of the entity's privacy notice or other specific instructions or requirements. The entity has procedures in place to evaluate that the third parties have effective controls to meet the terms of the agreement, instructions, or requirements.
subcontrols.description: Discloses Personal Information Only to Appropriate Third Parties - Personal information is disclosed only to third parties who have agreements with the entity to protect personal information in a manner consistent with the relevant aspects of the entity's privacy notice or other specific instructions or requirements. The entity has procedures in place to evaluate that the third parties have effective controls to meet the terms of the agreement, instructions, or requirements.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply, only share personal data with third parties under formal agreements that protect the information. These agreements must align with your privacy notice and any specific instructions. Implement a process to assess the third party's ability to meet these agreement terms through their own controls. Document the due diligence performed. Ensure these assessments are regularly reviewed and updated.

subcontrols.name: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party  - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.description: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party  - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.guidance: When a third party misuses your transferred personal information, act swiftly. Immediately investigate the breach and determine its scope. Contact the third party to demand corrective action and secure the data. Notify affected individuals as required by law and contractual agreements. Document all actions and update your policies to prevent future incidents.

name: The entity obtains commitments from vendors and other third parties with access to personal information to notify the entity in the event of actual or suspected unauthorized disclosures of personal information. Such notifications are reported to appropriate personnel and acted on in accordance with established incident response procedures to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity obtains commitments from vendors and other third parties with access to personal information to notify the entity in the event of actual or suspected unauthorized disclosures of personal information. Such notifications are reported to appropriate personnel and acted on in accordance with established incident response procedures to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.description: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.guidance: When a third party misuses your transferred personal data, immediately investigate the incident. Implement your incident response plan, including containing the breach and notifying affected individuals.  Review and strengthen your third-party agreements to prevent future occurrences. Document all actions taken and lessons learned to improve your program.

subcontrols.name: Reports Actual or Suspected Unauthorized Disclosures - A process exists for obtaining commitments from vendors and other third parties to report to the entity actual or suspected unauthorized disclosures of personal information.
subcontrols.description: Reports Actual or Suspected Unauthorized Disclosures - A process exists for obtaining commitments from vendors and other third parties to report to the entity actual or suspected unauthorized disclosures of personal information.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure your vendor contracts mandate reporting of data breaches. Define a clear process for vendors to notify you of unauthorized disclosures.  Establish a communication plan for responding to vendor breach reports. Document all reported incidents and your subsequent actions. Regularly audit vendor compliance with this reporting requirement.

name: The entity provides notification of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity provides notification of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.description: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party - The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
subcontrols.guidance: When a third party misuses personal information, immediately investigate and contain the breach.  Notify affected individuals as required by regulations.  Document the incident, actions taken, and findings.  Review and update agreements with third parties to prevent recurrence. Take corrective action against the third party, up to and including termination of the relationship.

subcontrols.name: Provides Notice of Breaches and Incidents - The entity has a process for providing notice of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.description: Provides Notice of Breaches and Incidents - The entity has a process for providing notice of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.guidance: Establish a clear incident response plan. This plan must outline who to notify (data subjects, regulators, etc.) and when after a security breach or incident. Ensure you include the necessary contact information and the required content for each notification. Practice this plan through regular testing and training. Finally, document all notifications and the rationale behind them.

name: The entity provides data subjects with an accounting of the personal information held and disclosure of the data subjects' personal information, upon the data subjects' request, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity provides data subjects with an accounting of the personal information held and disclosure of the data subjects' personal information, upon the data subjects' request, to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Identifies Types of Personal Information and Handling Process - The types of personal information and sensitive personal information and the related processes, systems, and third parties involved in the handling of such information are identified.
subcontrols.description: Identifies Types of Personal Information and Handling Process - The types of personal information and sensitive personal information and the related processes, systems, and third parties involved in the handling of such information are identified.
subcontrols.guidance: To comply with this SOC2 control, meticulously document all personal and sensitive personal information your organization collects. Detail how this data is processed, including specific systems and any third-party involvement. Outline security measures applied at each stage. Regularly review and update this documentation to reflect changes in data handling practices.

subcontrols.name: Captures, Identifies, and Communicates Requests for Information - Requests for an accounting of personal information held and disclosures of the data subjects' personal information are captured, and information related to the requests is identified and communicated to data subjects to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.description: Captures, Identifies, and Communicates Requests for Information - Requests for an accounting of personal information held and disclosures of the data subjects' personal information are captured, and information related to the requests is identified and communicated to data subjects to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet SOC2's privacy objectives, diligently document all requests for personal information. Clearly identify the details of each request, including the data subject's information. Communicate the status and results of these requests back to the data subject promptly and transparently. This ensures accountability and fulfills your privacy obligations.

name: The entity collects and maintains accurate, up-to-date, complete, and relevant personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.
description: The entity collects and maintains accurate, up-to-date, complete, and relevant personal information to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy.

subcontrols.name: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information - Personal information is accurate and complete for the purposes for which it is to be used.
subcontrols.description: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information - Personal information is accurate and complete for the purposes for which it is to be used.
subcontrols.guidance: To satisfy this SOC2 control, implement processes to verify personal information. Regularly review and update data to maintain accuracy. Provide users with mechanisms to access and correct their information. Implement data validation checks during input and updates. Document these processes and their effectiveness.

subcontrols.name: Ensures Relevance of Personal Information - Personal information is relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used.
subcontrols.description: Ensures Relevance of Personal Information - Personal information is relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used.
subcontrols.guidance: Regularly review collected personal information to ensure its continued relevance.  Document a clear purpose for each data element collected and used.  Purge or anonymize data when it's no longer needed for its stated purpose. Implement controls to prevent unnecessary data collection in the first place.

name: The entity implements a process for receiving, addressing, resolving, and communicating the resolution of inquiries, complaints, and disputes from data subjects and others and periodically monitors compliance to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. Corrections and other necessary actions related to identified deficiencies are made or taken in a timely manner.
description: The entity implements a process for receiving, addressing, resolving, and communicating the resolution of inquiries, complaints, and disputes from data subjects and others and periodically monitors compliance to meet the entity's objectives related to privacy. Corrections and other necessary actions related to identified deficiencies are made or taken in a timely manner.

subcontrols.name: Communicates to Data Subjects - Data subjects are informed about how to contact the entity with inquiries, complaints, and disputes.
subcontrols.description: Communicates to Data Subjects - Data subjects are informed about how to contact the entity with inquiries, complaints, and disputes.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure a readily accessible method for data subjects to contact you with questions or concerns, like a dedicated email address or phone number. Clearly publish this contact information in your privacy policy or on your website. Acknowledge and respond to data subject inquiries promptly and professionally. Document all communications and resolutions. This demonstrates transparency and accountability, fulfilling the SOC2 control.

subcontrols.name: Addresses Inquiries, Complaints, and Disputes - A process is in place to address inquiries, complaints, and disputes.
subcontrols.description: Addresses Inquiries, Complaints, and Disputes - A process is in place to address inquiries, complaints, and disputes.
subcontrols.guidance: Implement a clear process for handling customer inquiries, complaints, and disputes. This includes logging, acknowledging, investigating, and resolving each issue promptly.  Document all interactions and resolutions for audit purposes and continuous improvement. Ensure escalation paths exist for complex or unresolved matters.  Regularly analyze feedback to identify and address systemic issues.

subcontrols.name: Documents and Communicates Dispute Resolution and Recourse - Each complaint is addressed, and the resolution is documented and communicated to the individual.
subcontrols.description: Documents and Communicates Dispute Resolution and Recourse - Each complaint is addressed, and the resolution is documented and communicated to the individual.
subcontrols.guidance: Ensure all customer complaints are formally received, tracked, and investigated.  Develop a clear, documented process outlining how you'll address and resolve these disputes.  Document the resolution for each complaint, detailing the actions taken and outcomes. Communicate the resolution back to the individual who filed the complaint. Maintain records for audit purposes.

subcontrols.name: Documents and Reports Compliance Review Results - Compliance with objectives related to privacy are reviewed and documented, and the results of such reviews are reported to management. If problems are identified, remediation plans are developed and implemented.
subcontrols.description: Documents and Reports Compliance Review Results - Compliance with objectives related to privacy are reviewed and documented, and the results of such reviews are reported to management. If problems are identified, remediation plans are developed and implemented.
subcontrols.guidance: This SOC2 control requires you to regularly review and document your privacy compliance efforts.  Report findings to management, highlighting successes and any identified weaknesses.  Develop and execute remediation plans promptly if any issues or gaps in compliance are discovered.  This ensures accountability and continuous improvement of your privacy practices.

subcontrols.name: Documents and Reports Instances of Noncompliance - Instances of noncompliance with objectives related to privacy are documented and reported and, if needed, corrective and disciplinary measures are taken on a timely basis.
subcontrols.description: Documents and Reports Instances of Noncompliance - Instances of noncompliance with objectives related to privacy are documented and reported and, if needed, corrective and disciplinary measures are taken on a timely basis.
subcontrols.guidance: To meet this SOC2 control, meticulously document all privacy noncompliance incidents.  Report these incidents promptly to relevant stakeholders.  Develop and implement corrective actions to address the root cause of the noncompliance.  Consistently apply disciplinary measures, as needed, to those responsible for the breaches.  Maintain thorough records of the entire process.

subcontrols.name: Performs Ongoing Monitoring - Ongoing procedures are performed for monitoring the effectiveness of controls over personal information and for taking timely corrective actions when necessary.
subcontrols.description: Performs Ongoing Monitoring - Ongoing procedures are performed for monitoring the effectiveness of controls over personal information and for taking timely corrective actions when necessary.
subcontrols.guidance: Continuously monitor the effectiveness of your SOC 2 controls. Regularly review security logs, system configurations, and access privileges. Implement alerts for suspicious activity and potential vulnerabilities. Promptly address identified weaknesses and document all corrective actions taken. This ensures data protection and compliance are maintained over time.
